entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow near midnight. Risk of snow squalls after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:11 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
